MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Lyon Close, Westfield Street, Wilson Close and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations required by Cadent Utility on the gas network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:28pm on 18th November 2020.
